item.title: Build Interest From Coins in Your Bank (Concept)
item.dc:creator: @meiscooldude meiscooldude
item.description:
@meiscooldude wrote:

Cool idea, but banks can’t make money from just giving free interest. They have to turn around and loan out money that people deposit! Why not allow banks to give out loans [at high interest rates], and allow the interest rates of deposits and loans to fluctuate?

You could have a lot of fun setting up a system like this, lot of ways to regulate it. You could even setup a customer loyalty system, the longer a player has been on the server, the better interest rates they can receive.

Read full topic
item.source: Build Interest From Coins in Your Bank (Concept)

item.title: Build Interest From Coins in Your Bank (Concept)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It’s an good idea, but in practice it’s bad for the economy of the server. If everyone has access to the same free thing, and there is no correlative sink to siphon the generated money from the game (without providing extra benefits), you may as well give the players access to a command that gives them X GP every day.

In short, there are reasons banks can give interest out to savings accounts, and it’s because they also take money from other accounts. If your economy is acting as the model for the bank (giving interest), then it needs to take as well, or you end up with uncontrollable inflation and devaluation of your currency.

EDIT - I do want to emphasize though that it’s great that you are coming up with ideas

Read full topic
item.source: Build Interest From Coins in Your Bank (Concept)

item.title: Build Interest From Coins in Your Bank (Concept)
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

TannerRSC:

Good job, but this already existed on alot of servers…

lul. Nothing else to say about that.

OT: Great release, and great idea.

You could really thrive from this. Here’s and idea for the tax, make it about once a week, but make it so that all accounts get it at one time, online or offline, so that when the log in they have to pay the tax, or it gets removed from their amount of coins, but make it random so that they don’t know when to drop their coins and cheat the system.

item.title: Build Interest From Coins in Your Bank (Concept)
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“relexlawl, post:13, topic:462592”]Mate, I’m sorry, but I just can’t bare to look at this…

[code]public int interestDays;
public boolean receivedInterest;

public class BankInterest {

private static final double RATE = 0.01;

public static void init(Player player) {
	if (player.receivedInterest)
		return;
	if (player.interestDays > 7)
		player.interestDays = 0; //resets interest rate to 0
	player.interestDays++;
	for (int i = 0; i < player.bankItems.length; i++) {
		if (player.bankItems[i] != null && player.bankItems[i] == 995) {
			player.bankItemsN[i] += (player.bankItems[N] * Math.pow(1 + RATE, player.interestDays) * 100);
		}
	}
}

}[/code][/quote]I’m sorry too, but I can’t bare to look at yours either.

item.title: Build Interest From Coins in Your Bank (Concept)
item.dc:creator: @Broken_Britain Broken Britain
item.description:
@Broken_Britain wrote:

^Omg yes. And a dole office for the poor lol. You actually gave me a few ideas. Currently the basic system I wrote only works when you are logged in. The intention was to use it so it accumulates a block of interest once per day, but for the sake of concept I obviously did not write all those methods to run in a separate program.

Now I’ve added it to my server I’m going to implement the interest per day system and maybe some of those additions you mentioned. I also plan to make it run regardless whether the player is on or offline, I just haven’t figured that out yet. Perhaps a separate thread?

Read full topic
item.source: Build Interest From Coins in Your Bank (Concept)

item.title: Build Interest From Coins in Your Bank (Concept)
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Adding a feature like this is good for several reasons. A few being:

  1. Veteran players will be rewarded by this system.
  2. Players who quit could be encouraged to come back, because of the interest that has accumulated in their Bank.
  3. Everyone likes Gold and everyone needs it. Players would login just once per day to check on their interest rates.
  4. Interest adds a whole new concept to the game.

A few things that could be derived from this:

  1. Bank loans with interest that must be paid back.
  2. Investments. Whether this be stocks, bonds, houses, ect.
  3. Preferred Customer status at banks, thus resulting in small benefits, such as perhaps being able to use the Quick-Deposit box.
  4. Item Pawns. You can Pawn any item at a fraction of It’s price, and you have a certain time limit to pick the Item up. If you fail to pick it up from Pawn, interest will keep accumulating until you eventually lose it.

This is not content that we have or are working on.

Read full topic

item.title: Build Interest From Coins in Your Bank (Concept)
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Broken Britain:

Do any of you think it’s bad for the economy in any way? After all it’s a constant flow of free coins. I think it adds a bit of fine detail to your game, and would be balanced out if your players had to pay taxes every so often too. So they get the illusion of free money, but in fact you are removing just as much coin via tax.

What if they had to pay a daily fee, or like you said a tax, to use the bank?

Read full topic
